dashboard.title: My Dashboard

list.name: max cpu
list.query: select max(cpu_avg_busy) from osmon WHERE ("customer" =~ /^$customer_name$/ AND "machine" =~ /^$Machine$/) AND $timeFilter

dashboard.description: dbmonitor output stored in influx importing dbmonitor outputs

targets.query: SELECT max("cpu_avg_busy") FROM "osmon_sum" WHERE ("customer"::tag =~ /^$customer_name$/ AND "server"::tag =~ /^$Machine$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT sum("bpm") FROM "bets_per_min" WHERE ("customer"::tag =~ /^$customer_name$/ AND "server"::tag =~ /^$Machine$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(linear)
SELECT max("cpu_avg_busy") FROM "default"."osmon"WHERE ("customer"::tag =~ /^$customer_name$/ AND "server"::tag =~ /^$Machine$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(linear)

SELECT max("cores") FROM "default"."server_usage" WHERE ("customer" =~ /^$customer_name$/ AND "machine" =~ /^$Machine$/) AND metric !~/TOTAL/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "tag_1" fill(none)
SELECT max("cpu_avg_busy") FROM "default"."osmon" WHERE ("customer" =~ /^$customer_name$/ AND "machine" =~ /^$Machine$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)

SELECT max("cores") FROM "default"."server_usage" WHERE ("customer" =~ /^$customer_name$/ AND "machine" =~ /^$Machine$/) AND metric !~/TOTAL/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "tag_1" fill(none)

SELECT max("mtx_avg") AS "mutex average", max("rea_avg") AS "ready queue average", max("rea_rep_pct") AS "repeating query average", max("act_avg") AS "active average", max("lck_mtx_avg") AS "locked mutex average" FROM "default"."queue_summary" WHERE ("customer" =~ /^$customer_name$/ AND "machine" =~ /^$Machine$/  ) AND $timeFilter AND lck_mtx_avg < 3000 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT max("backlog") FROM "default"."replication_info" WHERE ("customer" =~ /^$customer_name$/ AND "machine" =~ /^$Machine$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),tag_1 fill(linear)

SELECT difference(mean("bufreads")) AS "buff reads", difference(mean("bufwrits")) AS "buff writes", difference(mean("bufwaits")) AS "buff waits", mean("bufwrits_sinceckpt") AS "buff writes since checkpoint" FROM "default"."buffers" WHERE ("customer" =~ /^$customer_name$/ AND "machine" =~ /^$Machine$/ AND "tag_1" =~ /^$page_size$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

SELECT difference(mean("bufreads")) AS "buff reads" FROM "default"."buffers" WHERE ("customer" =~ /^$customer_name$/ AND "machine" =~ /^$Machine$/ AND "tag_1" = 'select tag value') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "tag_1" fill(none)

SELECT difference(mean("bufreads")) AS "buff reads" FROM "default"."buffers" WHERE ("customer" =~ /^$customer_name$/ AND "machine" =~ /^$Machine$/ AND "tag_1" = 'select tag value') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "tag_1" fill(none)
SELECT mean("dirtypctnow") FROM "default"."lru_stats" WHERE ("tag_1" =~ /^$page_size$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.label: Customer
list.name: customer_name
list.query: select distinct(customer) from customer_server where customer !~/Williamhill/

list.label: machine_name
list.name: Machine
list.query: select distinct(machine) from customer_server  WHERE customer =~ /^$customer_name$/

list.label: partition_name
list.name: Partitions
list.query: SELECT tag_1,top(buffer_reads,tag_1,20) FROM (SELECT sum($profile_type) as buffer_reads  FROM partition_summary WHERE "customer" =~ /^$customer_name$/ AND "machine" =~ /^$Machine$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY tag_1)
